title: New: The Neighbourhood – Honest
body:
If I was President of the World, my first move would be to ban lyric videos.

Aside from that, this new track from **The Neighbourhood** is pretty great, and certainly acts as a marker showing how far they’ve come from the humble days of the Sweater Weather demo, way back when. This is the best Spiderman song since Chad Kroeger’s [Hero](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=etp8L9pbqeM). Check out Honest below.
